value.name: U.S. Proposes $242 Million in Penalties for Traders

value.name: Apostle Bartholomew traveled widely
value.description: Considered to be the same man as the "Nathanael" discussed in the Gospel of John, Bartholomew's missions after Jesus Christ's ascension may have been as far-flung as India, Ethiopia and Mesopotamia, between the Euphrates and Tigris rivers in present-day ...

value.name: PHOTOS: See the transformation of Hedge End from tiny hamlet to bustling town
